title: Trump updating Nato leaders on Putin summit after ‘lengthy’ call with Zelenskyy, White House says – live
summary: US president earlier said it was up to Ukrainian leader to reach a ceasefire and that a meeting would be set up between Zelenskyy and Putin No deal after brief Trump-Putin talks on Ukraine in Alaska The president has yet to deplane, but is currently greeting Alaska governor Muke Dunleavy and senators Lisa Murkowski and Dan Sullivan , all Republicans, aboard Air Force One, per the White House. White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt also says that for the expanded bilateral meeting and lunch, Trump, Rubio, and Witkoff will be joined by treasury secretary Scott Bessent , commerce secretary Howard Lutnick , defense secretary Pete Hegseth , and White House chief of staff Susie Wiles . Continue reading...
